name: US Soldier Training
description:
Enter in army training school and follow your drill sergeant’s instructions in an assault course of basic army training game and try to become a daring us soldier and rule the boot camp of US army training academy after thrilling training missions.

Features of US Soldier Training:
• Basic US Army Training Course
• Demanding Drill Sergeant
• Thrilling American Army Assault Course
• Military Training School
• Challenging Training Missions
• US National Guard and Marine Commander
